reviewText: The original Robocop movies are dark classics.  The story is morbid yet warm, gruesome yet beautiful.  The director's style was first of its kind.  There are moments where you are watching the narrative and all of a sudden, the movie goes into commercial, except it isn't a lucky charms or Nobody beats the Wiz commercial, it is a sunblock commerical because in the Robocop future, there is no ozone layer.  The director does this commercial style in Starship Troopers as well.

Well i was supposed to get the remake. Got that one. And Robocop 1-3. Well i got the orginal but not 2 and 3. Pretty let down. That i had bought the bundle collection that had 4 discs but all i got was the original and remake.

Advertised as the original trilogy and the new movie or the Robocop series, thats what I expected to get.  Only received the first film and the new one.  Cant find anywhere to report this, so adding a review!
I bought this  set just for the original movie,but it was nice to get the rest. I was fine with getting the remake with the set even thought I don't like it that much,when compared to the original.
Great collectible and well worth the 'reasonable' price.
awesome , fast shipping and great price.
AWESOME!!! Not only the original movies but the new one as well...perfect gift...to myself, lol.
